stimulusHtml: The position of a particle moving in the xy-plane is given by the parametric functions x(t) and y(t) for which x ′ ( t )=tsint MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F8E@ and y ′ ( t )=5 e −3t +2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4105@ . What is the slope of the line tangent to the path of the particle at the point at which t=2 ?
